permissionDenied: ❌ You don't have the permission to run this command
notInVocal: ❌ You have to be in a voice channel to do this
noArgsSongSearch: ❌ You need to provide a link or some keywords
cantLoop: ❌ You need to have a song playing to loop it
errorJoin: ❌ A music needs to be playing for the bot to change channels
noVolume: ❌ You need to provide a value for the volume
nothingPlayingVolume: ❌ You need to have a song playing to change the volume
toMuchArgsVolume: ❌ There are too many arguments, please provide a single number
noNumber: ❌ You need to provide a number (1 being 100% volume)
earrapeFail: ❌ Conditions not completed in 8 sec, earrape mode canceled
notAllowedToEarrape: ❌ You are not allowed to Earrape
cannotBlacklistOwner: Bro tried to blacklist the owner lmfaooo
noArgsProvided: ❌ You need to provide a user ID.
userNotWhitelisted: ❌ User is not in the whitelist.
songAddedToQueue:
✅ '**SONG_TITLE**' has been added to the queue
<url>
volumeChanged: ✅ The volume was successfully set to VOLUME
startEarrape: ✅ The volume was successfully set to ___**EARRAPE**___ :ear: :headstone:
endEarrape: ✅ The volume was successfully set back to VOLUME
earrapeWarning:
⚠ Are you sure? It can severely damage the hearing of all people in the channel!
Press the ✅ reaction to continue
